codeSystems.name: ImmunizationStatusCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Status Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the current status of the administered dose of vaccine.

codeSystems.name: ImmunizationStatusReasonCodes
codeSystems.title: Immunization Status Reason Codes
codeSystems.description: The value set to instantiate this attribute should be drawn from a terminologically robust code system that consists of or contains concepts to support describing the reason why a dose of vaccine was not administered. This value set is provided as a suggestive example.

codeSystems.name: SNOMEDCTRouteCodes
codeSystems.title: SNOMED CT Route Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set includes all Route codes from SNOMED CT - provided as an exemplar.

codeSystems.name: Common UCUM units
codeSystems.description: Commonly encountered UCUM units (for purposes of helping populate look ups.

codeSystems.name: LanguageCodesWithLanguageAndOptionallyARegionModifier
codeSystems.title: Language codes with language and optionally a region modifier
codeSystems.description: This value set includes codes from [BCP-47](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47). This value set matches the ONC 2015 Edition LanguageCommunication data element value set within C-CDA to use a 2 character language code if one exists,   and a 3 character code if a 2 character code does not exist. It points back to [RFC 5646](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5646), however only the language codes are required, all other elements are optional.

codeSystems.name: USCoreADIFinding
codeSystems.title: US Core ADI Finding
codeSystems.description: The US Core ADI Finding Value Set is a 'starter set' of findings used for fetching and storing advanced directives.

codeSystems.name: USCoreClinicalNoteType
codeSystems.title: US Core Clinical Note Type
codeSystems.description: The US Core Clinical Note Type Value Set is a 'starter set' of types supported for fetching and storing clinical notes.

codeSystems.name: USCoreConditionCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Condition Codes
codeSystems.description: This describes the problem. Diagnosis/Problem List is broadly defined as a series of brief statements that catalog a patient's medical, nursing, dental, social, preventative and psychiatric events and issues that are relevant to that patient's healthcare (e.g., signs, symptoms, and defined conditions). ICD-10 is appropriate for Diagnosis information, and ICD-9 for historical information.

codeSystems.name: USCoreDischargeDisposition
codeSystems.title: US Core Discharge Disposition
codeSystems.description: [National Uniform Billing Committee](http://www.nubc.org/), manual UB-04, UB form locator 17.

codeSystems.name: USCoreEncounterType
codeSystems.title: US Core Encounter Type
codeSystems.description:
The type of encounter: a specific code indicating type of service provided. This value set includes codes from SNOMED CT decending from the concept 308335008 (Patient encounter procedure (procedure)) and codes from the Current Procedure and Terminology (CPT) found in the following CPT sections:
- 99211-99499 E/M - 99500-99600 home health (mainly nonphysician, such as newborn care in home) - 99605-99607 medication management - 98966-98968 non physician telephone services
(subscription to AMA Required)

codeSystems.name: USCoreProcedureCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Procedure Codes
codeSystems.description: Concepts from CPT, SNOMED CT, HCPCS Level II Alphanumeric Codes, ICD-10-PCS,CDT and LOINC code systems that can be used to indicate the type of procedure performed.

codeSystems.name: USCoreProvenancePaticipantTypeCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core Provenance Participant Type Codes
codeSystems.description: The type of participation a provenance agent played for a given target.

codeSystems.name: USCoreServiceRequestCategoryCodes
codeSystems.title: US Core ServiceRequest Category Codes
codeSystems.description: A set of SNOMED CT and LOINC concepts to classify a requested service

codeSystems.name: UspsTwoLetterAlphabeticCodes
codeSystems.title: USPS Two Letter Alphabetic Codes
codeSystems.description: This value set defines two letter USPS alphabetic codes.

codeSystems.name: ActPharmacySupplyType
codeSystems.title: ActPharmacySupplyType
codeSystems.description: Identifies types of dispensing events

codeSystems.name: HL7FormatCodes
codeSystems.title: HL7 ValueSet of Format Codes for use with Document Sharing
codeSystems.description: The HL7-FormatCodes value set is defined to be the set of FormatCode(s) defined by implementation guides published by HL7 and other SDOs. The use of a formatCode from the FormatCodes value set specifies the technical format that a document conforms to. The formatCode is a further specialization more detailed than the mime-type. The formatCode provides sufficient information to allow any potential document content consumer to know if it can process and/or display the content of the document based on the document encoding, structure and template conformance indicated by the formatCode. The set of formatCodes is intended to be extensible. The Content Logical Description is defined intentionally to permit formatCodes defined by other Standards Development Organizations to be added by inclusion of additional formatCode Code Systems.

codeSystems.name: YesNoUnknownNotAsked
codeSystems.title: Yes No Unknown NotAsked
codeSystems.description: This value set contains 4 concepts commonly used as answers to items in a questionnaire.
